sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached at Balderton March 27. 1646. Being a day of humiliation thorow-out the whole army before Newark. / By Robert Ram minister of Spalding in Lincolnshire, and chaplaine to Colonell Rossiter. Ram, Robert, d. 1657.
[6], 21, [1] p.
Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley., London, : 1646.
Advertisement signed "Ioseph Caryle" on verso of first leaf. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 25". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[6], 21, [1] p.
Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley., London, : 1646.
Advertisement signed "Ioseph Caryle" on verso of first leaf. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aprill 25". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

the Kings Head in the Old Bayley.
